Issue.creator: drozd
Issue.summary: Generate some multi-validator docker compose files
Issue.description: Currently `sawtooth-core/docker/compose` has just one example compose file, and it only starts one validator. Create a few multi-validator compose files with various settings. Even better, create a configurable tool to generate such files. A good idea would be to use the integration test node controller ( https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-core/blob/master/integration/sawtooth_integration/tests/node_controller.py|https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-core/blob/master/integration/sawtooth_integration/tests/node_controller.py) ) as a starting point.
